name: ALAssetsFilter
desc: ALAssetsFilter encapsulates filtering criteria to be used when retrieving assets from a group.

items.name: class func allAssets() -> ALAssetsFilter!
items.desc: Returns a filter that gets all assets in the assets group.

items.name: class func allPhotos() -> ALAssetsFilter!
items.desc: Returns a filter that gets all photos in the assets group.

items.name: class func allVideos() -> ALAssetsFilter!
items.desc: Returns a filter that gets all videos in the assets group.
